map_scrap.description: A cryptic piece of parchment showing a hidden room.

rope.description: Stabilizes unstable structures or crosses pits.

0.name: Tomb Entrance
0.description: You stand in front of an old doorway, framed by cobwebs. You feel energized and maybe a little scared at the same time. Your leather satchel contains: - Torch - Matchsticks - Bronze chisel - Coil of rope

interactions.result: You light your torch and step through the ancient doorway... The air grows cold as you enter the pyramid proper.
You have a torch, matchsticks, a chisel, and a coil of rope.
Your courage fails you! As you turn to run, a loose stone gives way beneath your foot. You tumble down the hillside and wake up hours later at the base of the pyramid. GAME OVER

1.name: Entrance Hall
1.description: You stand in a crumbling limestone hall. Faded paintings of Pharaoh Djoser adorn the walls, his cartouche barely visible. Sunlight streams through cracks in the collapsed ceiling, illuminating a cracked urn, a broken statue of Anubis, and a dusty scroll. To the north, a heavy stone door blocks your path.

interactions.result:
You unroll the dusty scroll:
"Beware the path of sand; only the wise may walk unscathed. The scarab's wings are bound by five: key, flame, mirror, scale, and life."
take a closer look at the statue...

The urn shatters! Inside you find:
- A map scrap: 'Hall of Traps lies east of Anubis' judgment'

You pry open the compartment with your chisel!
Obtained BRONZE KEY!
The bronze key fits! The stone door grinds open...

The door shows five slots. A carving warns:
"Only those who gather the pharaoh's trials may pass"

You stabilize the statue with your rope!
Revealed: Hidden passage to Room 5
The statue collapses! (-15 HP)

2.name: Chamber of Hieroglyphs
2.description: The air grows colder as you enter a rectangular chamber. Faded blue hieroglyphs cover the walls, their glow dimmed by centuries of dust. A stone pedestal stands at the center, holding a rusted khopesh. A stone snake sits curled at the base. To the east, a shadowy doorway promises progress.

interactions.result:
Hieroglyphs blaze to life!
Riddle: 'I am the scribe of the gods, Thoth, keeper of words. Speak my name to pass.'
Try saying 'Thoth' to the pedestal.
A compartment opens! Revealed: OBSIDIAN MIRROR
You safely claim the ancient khopesh
The snake springs to life! It bites you (-25 HP)
The pedestal sinks! Spikes descend (-25 HP)

A scarab carving glows. Its empty eyes stare back.
Clue: 'The mirror reflects the truth unseen.'
The shadowy doorway accepts your mirror's reflection...
Darkness repels you! The path remains sealed.

3.name: Hall of Traps
3.description: You enter a narrow corridor lit by flickering oil lamps. The floor has stone tiles engraved with ankhs (â˜¥) and chaos serpents (ð“†™). A mural shows Pharaoh Djoser holding a Golden Ankh. A golden pedestal glints in the distance.

interactions.result: Hieroglyphs reveal: 'The righteous walk in the shadow of life'
You slice the tripwire! Claimed GOLDEN ANKH
A dart fires from the pedestal! (-20 HP)
You pry open a hidden passage labeled 'Sekhmet's Path' (WARNING: Skips future rooms!)
You carefully step on ankh tiles to safety...
Serpent tiles trigger walls! (-15 HP)

4.name: Chamber of Anubis
4.description: A towering obsidian statue of Anubis dominates the chamber, holding golden scales and a spear. Two urns - one with a feather, one with a serpent - flank the statue. A cold myrrh-scented draft whispers through cracks.

interactions.result: Hieroglyphs translate: 'The heart must mirror the feather's truth, lest the serpent devour it.'
You find the SCALES OF MA'AT!
Poisonous gas erupts! (-30 HP)
Anubis' spear tilts toward the feather urn!
A hidden blade swings down! (-40 HP)
The scales glow, revealing the path to the treasure...
Anubis' spear blocks your path! You're not worthy yet.

5.name: Treasure Vault
5.description: The vault shimmers with gold and jewels. At its center rests the Golden Scarab of Ra, wings spread wide. Curses cover the walls, and a five-slot stone slab blocks escape.

interactions.result: Go back

The slots fill with light! The slab opens, revealing sunlight...
YOU ESCAPE WITH THE SCARAB!
The scarab's eyes flash RED! A sandstorm engulfs you... (-100 HP)
You ignite the SACRED FLAME! (Final item acquired)
Mirror reveals: 'The scarab's wings carry the righteous to rebirth'

The ceiling collapses! (-50 HP)
You barely escape through cracks...

victory.name: Victory
victory.description: You emerge from the pyramid, the Golden Scarab of Ra in hand. The sun shines brightly, and you feel a sense of accomplishment. You are now a legend!

partial_victory.name: Partial Victory
partial_victory.description: You escape with your life but without the Golden Scarab. The curse of the pyramid lingers in your mind.
